column4: Oh comeon people, no one of you have been able to help me with this issue  -_-, i need the help: i did a reinstalation of kubuntu, but i used 64amd instead, now runescape lags as hell at everymoment, and cannot use HD, i am thinking of reinstallation, its that the only solution?!
I wouldn't know. I don't run a 64 bit system OR runescape.
My laptop supports 64amd, but i am not pretty sure abouyt the driver, can u help me?
I don't know. Like I said, I don't play runescape, use 64bit ubuntu, or knwo what you're saying when you say "driver" :)
